ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all , This post isn t very bard oriented , but i thought maybe someone out there could help me. I ve been in BB , and Cb recently , and i ve picked up a
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all ,
This post isn't very bard oriented , but i thought maybe someone out
there could help me. I've been in BB , and Cb recently , and i've picked up a
buncha bandit tongues. I know they're for a quest , and my question is ,
where does the quest start ? can't find the darned thing anywhere , i assumed
Kaladim since they're the BB bandits , but it either wasn't there , or i
missed someone ( very very possible). And no one one my server seems to
know.(been asking around) If anyone could help me out it would be very
appreciated. Oh and BTW , if anyone out here has done it , is it worth it ?
not so much for a reward , but in the not-lame sense . rewards are good
though.

Ulaien 16th lvl bard of Tunare
